page.title:
Quick Response Freight Manual (1996) Purpose
Quick Response Freight Manual (1996)
Purpose
page.normal_text:
To provide background information to new freight planners
To provide background information to new freight planners

To help planners locate freight-related data
To help planners locate freight-related data

To provide simple techniques and transferable parameters for the conventional four-step planning process
To provide simple techniques and transferable parameters
for the conventional four-step planning process

To provide techniques and transferable parameters for site planning
To provide techniques and transferable parameters
for site planning

Quick Response Freight Manual Update (2007) Purpose
Quick Response Freight Manual Update (2007)
Purpose
page.normal_text:
To update the 1996 manual
To update the 1996 manual

To provide freight methods appropriate for different geographic and temporal scales
To provide freight methods appropriate for different
geographic and temporal scales

To provide alternative analysis methods, data sources, and data collection methods to improve the accuracy of freight forecasts

and data collection methods to improve the accuracy of
freight forecasts
